creditline: Gift of Sue Y.S. Kimm and Seymour Grufferman
description: portrait of figure in green headwrap; wearing blue coat with white ties around neck and waist; wearing black shirt beneath coat; hands are placed in front of body; wearing long garments that cover hands up to fingers; seems to be wearing long fur cape; yellow background;
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Title unknown [Woman Wearing Green Headwrap in Blue Coat]
